title: Laughter and Grief by the White Sea

sources.title: Laughter and Grief by the White Sea
sources.description:
The story of a young boy Sanya, a student of a boarding school in the Far North. His father drowned in the White Sea, and one day the thirst for justice lead the child to a small island. Sanya will have to face the local hermit and even the police, but, most importantly, the teenager will challenge the elements themselves.

Year of production: 2021

Director: Alexander Zachinyaev
Writers: Alexander Zachinyaev
Cinematographer: Alexander Rodin
Composer: Alexey Chintsov
Production Designer: Vladimir Namestnikov, Elena Ermakova

Cast: Boris Galkin, Nikita Manets, Dmitry Kulichkov, Elena Makhova, Oleg Milyakhovsky

metadata.Plot: Several Russian Pomorsk men who live by the White Sea have brought in their boats for the evening and are relaxing inside a fisherman's hut. One of them says "there has been so much untruth told about our region that it is time to set the record straight" and proceeds to tell a variety of outrageous tall tales (based on traditional folklore of the Russian north). As the evening gets later, the tales turn more serious.
metadata.Writer: Boris Shergin, Stepan Pisakhov, Yuriy Koval
metadata.Actors: Evgeniy Leonov, Yuriy Volyntsev, Anatoliy Barantsev
